QuestData.Title: Prepare for Takeoff
QuestData.Description: I've got an idea, but it's going to involve some footwork on your part. As a goblin cartel, the Blackwater Raiders have a lot of explosives on hand. In fact, I know for a fact that our old friend Narkk keeps a case in the back of his shop, in the Old Port Authority.$b$bGo grab them and bring them here, if they haven't already exploded.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain Narkk's Handbombs from the Old Port Authority inside Booty Bay.
QuestData.RewardText: You brought them! I'm beginning to think the tide is turning in our favor, $n.
